description: Numbers n such that sigma(n) - n = n - pi(n) - 1 where pi(n) is A000720.
mathematica: For[i = 1, i < 1000000000000, i++, If[DivisorSigma[1, i] - i == i - PrimePi[i] - 1, Print[i]]; ]; - Sam Handler (sam_5_5_5_0(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 29 2006
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_
extensions: More terms from Sam Handler (sam_5_5_5_0(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 29 2006
